column3:
Thanks for your contribution, but this overlaps almost 100% with the existing `README.md` and `doc/README.md` with regard to content.

We should probably remove the content from there to make sure there is no overlap, or just add pointers to there instead.

What I meant in #8160, sorry if I was unclear, is that a README file should be part of the installation. That is still not the case af

I agree, this is an overlap as I mentioned in the description. But I don't quite get what you mean by "should be part of the installation" (pardon me if I'm being a little noob-ish). If you could elaborate more, that'd be nice. Thanks!

> But I don't quite get what you mean by "should be part of the installation" (pardon me if I'm being a little noob-ish)

I mean it should be part of the distributions generated by gitian, which are published on the site after a release.
They are built by scripts, e.g. https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/contrib/gitian-descriptors/gitian-linux.yml
Closing, as this PR doesn't currently fix #8160.
